addressinfo.description: Geographic position for site and address component information

AddressLine1.description: First line of nearby street address

AddressLine2.description: Second line of nearby street address

CountryID.description: The reference ID for the Country

dataprovider.description: A Data Provider is the controller of the source data set used to construct the details for this POI. Data has been transformed and interpreted from it's original form. Each Data Provider provides data either by an explicit license or agreement.

Comments.description: General public comments with information about this Data Provider.

DataProviderStatusType.description: Status object describing whether this data provider is currently enabled and the type of source (manual entry, imported etc)

ID.description: The reference ID for this provider status type

IsProviderEnabled.description: If false, results from this data provider are not currently enabled

Title.description: The Title of this status type

DateLastImported.description: Date and time (UTC) the last import was performed for this data provider (if an import).

ID.description: The reference ID for this Data Provider

IsApprovedImport.description: If false, data may not be imported for this provider.

IsOpenDataLicensed.description: If true, data provider uses an Open Data license

IsRestrictedEdit.description: Currently not implemented. Indicates a potential editing restriction.

License.description: Summary of the licensing which applies for this Data Provider. Each Data Provider has one specific license or agreement. Usage of the data requires acceptance of the given license.
examples: Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)

Title.description: The Title for this Data Provider

WebsiteURL.description: Website URL for this data provider

submissionstatustype.description: Submission Status object, detailing the POI listing status

IsLive.description: If true, POI listing is live (not draft or de-listed)

IsPayAtLocation.description: If true, usage requires paying at location

description: A POI (Point of Interest) is the top-level set of information regarding a Site with electric vehicle charging. With the exception of the AddressInfo property, other object properties may not be populated in a compact result set and instead only the associated reference IDs will be set (e.g. UsageTypeID, DataProviderID etc)

examples: Over 2 kW, usually non-domestic socket type
Comments.title: The Comments Schema

DataProviderID.description: The reference ID for the Data Provider of this POI

DataProvidersReference.description: If present, this is the Data Providers own key for this POI within their source data set

DataQualityLevel.description: A metric applied during imports to indicate a quality level based on available information detail (5 == best). Largely unused currently.

DateCreated.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI was added to the Open Charge Map database

DateLastConfirmed.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI was last confirmed according to the data provider or a user. See DateLastVerified for a dynamically computed date based on multiple signals.

DateLastStatusUpdate.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI or directly related child properties were updated.

DateLastVerified.description: A dynamically computed value, the date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI was last confirmed by a user edit or related user comment

DatePlanned.description: The date and time (UTC, ISO 8601) this POI is or was planned for commissioning. In general planned POIs should not be presented to end users until confirmed operational.

GeneralComments.description: General additional factual information for the POI. Users are discouraged from using this field for opinions on site quality etc.
examples: This is an open charge unit installed at the Coneygear Centre at Buttsgrove Way, Huntingdon

ID.description: The OCM reference ID for this POI (Point of Interest). A POI refers to a general site location and collection of equipment.

IsRecentlyVerified.description: A dynamically computed value indicating of any recenty confirmation activity has taken place for this site (positive check-ins etc)

MediaItems.description: A list of user submitted photos for this site

MetadataValues.title: Optional array of metadata values. Generally used to indicate data attribution but is also intended for future use to indicate surrounding amenties, links or foreign key values into other data sets.

NumberOfPoints.description: The number of bays or discreet stations available overall at this site. This indicates the limiting for number of simultaneous site users.

OperatorID.description: The reference ID of the equipment network operator or owner

OperatorsReference.description: The network operators own reference for this site (may be a site reference or a single equipment reference)

ParentChargePointID.description: If present, this data in this POI supercedes information in another POI. Generally not relevant to consumers.

PercentageSimilarity.description: If applicable, the approximate percentage similarity compared to another target POI

StatusTypeID.title: The overall operational status type reference ID for this POI (i.e. Operational etc). 0 == Unknown

SubmissionStatusTypeID.description: The reference ID for the submission status type which applied to this POI.

UUID.description: A universally unique identifier used as surrogate key. ID and UUID must be preserved when submitting POI update information.

UsageCost.description: Free text description of likely usage costs associated with this site. Generally relates to parking charges whether network operates this site as Free
examples: See network operators app for current charges

UsageTypeID.description: The reference ID for the site Usage Type, 0 == Unknown

UserComments.description: A list of user comments or check-ins for this site

title: POI
